```{r}
#| label: cvevents
cvevents <- function(tbl, when, what, where, details) {

    command_start <- "\\cvevent"

    res <- paste0(
        command_start, "{", tbl[[when]], "}", 
        "{", tbl[[what]], "}",
        "{", tbl[[where]], "}")
    
    tbl[[details]] <- sapply(tbl[[details]], function(x) paste0("{", x, "}", collapse = ","))
    res <- paste0(res, "{",tbl[[details]],"}")

    cat(res, sep = "\n")
}
```

# Summary

Data Scientist specialized in spatial statistics and statistical methodology, with extensive experience in public statistics and deep learning applications. Expert in implementing statistical models and developing data processing solutions at scale.
